element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithms creates a buffer around a set of features. Both the input and output layers are raster layers

image.description: Buffer layer created from a raster layer containing a channel network.

element.name: INPUT
element.text: The raster layer with the features to buffer. These should be represented by non-zero values. All cells not representing a feature to buffer should have a zero value or the no-data value of the layer.

element.name: METHOD
element.text:
The following methods are available:
* Fixed distance: the same buffer distance for all the cells. * Use cell value as: the buffer distance for each cell is the value of the cell itself, expresed in map units.

element.name: DIST
element.text: If the fixed distance method is used, the value of this parameter will be used as the buffer distance.

element.name: BUFFER
element.text: The buffer layer, containing the following values * 0: cells outside of the buffer. * 1: original feature cells. * 2: buffer cells.
